summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 20, Law's Addition, being the alley between 18th Avenue North and 19th Avenue North, from East Harrison Street to East Republican Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same in accordance with Majority Petition No. 115690 of the City Council of the Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
